es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index

Class SimpleFastFeatureIndex<F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index.SimpleFastFeatureIndex<F>
  • Type Parameters:
    F - type of the features
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureIndex<F>, FastFeatureIndex<F>

    public class SimpleFastFeatureIndex<F>
extends Object
implements FastFeatureIndex<F>
    Simple implementation of FastFeatureIndex backed by a bi-map IdxIndex
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
